Hey Simran, please meet Alin your incredible E-Mentor we've been telling you about :smile:.  Feel free to introduce yourselves, say a little bit about what you would like to get out of the mentorship and continue chatting within this channel. :wave:

I will now be leaving the channel, but please direct message myself or penny-prospela if you have any questions. All the best for now! :slightly_smiling_face:
_@emma has left the channel_
_@emma has left the channel_

Hi Alin!
I’m a graduate from Bournemouth University. I’m looking for roles in 3D prop/hard surface modelling
I wanted to seek advice on my showreel and how to stand out to get a job in the industry
Hi Simran, nice meeting you! Awesome, I'm also a Bournemouth graduate
Sure, do you have a link with your showreel? or are you currently working on it?

Almost forgot to give you my intro - So I've graduated from Bournemouth Uni about a year and a half ago (Computer Visualisation and Animation major) then got hired at MPC as a character and facial modeler, I've worked on Maleficent 2, Sonic's redesign and a couple other shows which are not released yet. Recently I've taken a winter break doing some commissions and personal work. I can't really say I have a lot of experience but I think I formed an eye for what the demand is in terms of quality hence why I'm here to try and give back with what I can. :)

Nice meeting you too! And that’s awesome! Well done with your progress, that’s really amazing.
And thank you for helping me out :blush:

Here’s a link to my website, which has my showreel too: 

<https://simranart.wordpress.com/|https://simranart.wordpress.com/>

I’m still working on some projects now. I’ve been collaborating with concept artists on Instagram, modelling what they draw. 
Trying to practice vehicles now, I have another stylised spaceship being designed for me at the moment, and I’m currently finishing off a stylised I’ve-Cream truck.
I’m just struggling to find reference for more realistic things.

attachments.title: ABOUT ME
attachments.text:
Hello! My name is Simran Matharu and welcome to my portfolio!



I am a 3D modelling and texturing artist, based in Birmingham, UK.



My work caters for advertising, film and television. Previously worked on Disney Junior’s ‘PJ Masks’.



Don’t hesitate to contact me with your enquiries.



Here is my latest showreel below:
